name: Welcome to Tomodachi Academy! Day 1
description:
Welcome to Tomodachi Academy is a short interactive story about a shy student that makes new friends during a rough first day at school. Walk around your classroom and get closer to three other students, each with their own quirks and personalities.

Made as a collaborative project between graduate students of the University of Southern California and the Tokyo University of the Arts.

FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED
